projects.title: Technocorner 2023
projects.desc: Technocorner is an annual event held by KMTETI FT UGM. This is the website for Technocorner 2023, made using MERN tech stack. I contributed to both the front end and the back end of this website, but mostly on the front end part.

projects.title: Find IT! 2023
projects.desc: Find IT UGM is an annual event held by KMTETI FT UGM. This is the website for Find IT UGM 2023, made using MERN tech stack. I was responsible to lead the front end team to work on the main website. I contributed in making the animations, layouts, logics, and also integrating to the back end.

projects.title: Night Login Profile Web
projects.desc: Website I built in NL's Profile Web Contest and won 3rd place. Made using TailwindCSS and NextJS.

projects.title: DTETI Open House
projects.desc: Website built for DTETI UGM Open House 2022, made by the IT Team using NextJS, Tailwindcss, and Firebase.

projects.title: Money Manager
projects.desc: Website to help manage spendings and gains. Made using NextJS and Firestore DB. This is a collaboration work with a friend.
